properties.name: spring.zipkin.kafka.topic
properties.description: Name of the Kafka topic where spans should be sent to Zipkin.

properties.name: spring.zipkin.rabbitmq.queue
properties.description: Name of the RabbitMQ queue where spans should be sent to Zipkin.

properties.name: spring.zipkin.activemq.queue
properties.description: Name of the ActiveMQ queue where spans should be sent to Zipkin.

properties.name: spring.zipkin.activemq.message-max-bytes
properties.description: Maximum number of bytes for a given message with spans sent to Zipkin over ActiveMQ.
